_source.text: [ 18 ] Picard is deemed the ultimate delegator of authority, knowing "how to gather and use data better than any other Star Trek captain."

text: [ 18 ] **Picard** is deemed the ultimate delegator of authority, knowing "how to gather and use data **better** **than** any other **Star** Trek captain."

_source.text: 08/01 Marathon: Durandal (a worthy port) 09/05 Stranglehold (far better than I expected) 10/23 Tomb Raider Anniversary for Xbox 360 10/23 Ace Combat 6: Fires of Liberation (but then I adore Ace Combat games) 10/23 Phoenix Wright, Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations 10/24 Exit (another worthy port) 11/06 Silent Hill Origins 11/06 Lego Star Wars: The Complete Saga (for those like me who missed the earlier ones) 11/20 Mass Effect
